title: Cloud Data Leak Containment
description: A Data Loss Prevention (DLP) tool alerts that a file containing sensitive data has been uploaded to a public cloud storage site.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the DLP alert and identify the user, file, and destination URL.
tasks.expected_outcome: Responder correctly identifies the key details of the data leak.

tasks.description: Immediately block the URL of the public cloud storage site at the network proxy to prevent further uploads.
tasks.expected_outcome: Responder successfully blocks the destination site.

tasks.description: Contact the user to understand the context of the upload and have them delete the public file immediately.
tasks.expected_outcome: Responder coordinates with the user to have the leaked file removed from the public site.
